abstract: The federal approval of Eylea came after years of research and a total $1.2 billion in losses.
snippet: The federal approval of Eylea came after years of research and a total $1.2 billion in losses.
lead_paragraph: It has three Nobel Prize winners on its board. Its chairman, P. Roy Vagelos, is a pharmaceutical industry star who ran Merck during its heyday. Its chief scientist has written frequently cited biomedical papers.

headline.main: Success Long in Coming for Eylea, a Vision Treatment
headline.print_headline: Success Long in Coming For a Vision Treatment
